content: Wandering Wight's swipe and stomp attacks are easy enough to avoid with the right timing. The ground pound moves, however, are the most dangerous tricks he has up his sleeves. The aftershocks that tear up the ground after those attacks can destroy you just as easily as they do the arena. The best way to combat those aftershocks is to run away and get as much distance between you and Wandering Wight as possible before the ground fractures.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Wandering Wight's swipe and stomp attacks are easy enough to avoid with the right timing. The ground pound moves, however, are the most dangerous tricks he has up his sleeves. The aftershocks that tear up the ground after those attacks can destroy you just as easily as they do the arena. The best way to combat those aftershocks is to run away and get as much distance between you and Wandering Wight as possible before the ground fractures.
